meanings.sent1: The lion's spirit remained unconquered despite the challenges it faced.
meanings.sent2: The unconquered fortress stood tall against all enemies.
meanings.sent3: The unconquered pizza slice bravely resisted being eaten.
meanings.sent4: Her unconquered determination was a beacon of inspiration to others.
meanings.sent5: The unconquered mountain peak loomed majestically in the distance.

meanings.definition: Not having been conquered or defeated.
meanings.sent1: The unconquered lands beyond the river were shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of an unconquered warrior who had never lost a battle.
meanings.sent3: The unconquered cookie jar tempted the mischievous child.
meanings.sent4: Her unconquered spirit soared high like an eagle in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unconquered city walls stood as a testament to resilience.
